Hi,

I would like to know more about how the frontier processes redirection=
 (i.e. what is happening when URI is being redirected, how does Heritrix kn=
ows that a URI is being redirected) and also is there a difference on how H=
eritrix process redirection between different forms of redirection (i.e. se=
rver side, javascripts, and maybe iframes?)

I tried reading some Heritrix =
documentations but have not found the answer yet.

Regards,
Zi Kai
